name: War Machines: Free to Play
description: Fight for your honor! Join now epic, explosive online multiplayer tank battles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel CPU Core i3 @ 2.1 GHZ or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon or NVIDIA GeForce (1 GB) Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: - Additional Notes: -
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 (64 bit) Processor: Intel CPU Core i5 @ 2.3 GHZ or AMD equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon or NVIDIA GeForce (2 GB) Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: - Additional Notes: -
